favourite.article: Amen and Amen. Lord, I am grateful for how You speak to us. This hymn will be apart my daily walk with Thee, to share with others, for "all of us have been running so long". Bless You God.
Amen. Lord! I Love You, I need You, I want You Lord; I give myself to You. Amen.
I really like this song. It is so true.
I love You Lord, I need You Lord, I want to gain much more of You Lord.
In demanding and pleading with the Lord as a vulnerable child and capricious bride with released tears to be the living and loving Lord is treasurable before God. Thank you.
This hymn is just timely help for me. This is my daily prayer now.

I love this hymn!!! What else would be more wonderful than this - that we can sing and tell Him such a great, heartiest love song... It's been another hymn flowing in my life from work/home/walking on the street/a song to share with the saints and friends around... all day long...
This song is to sing all the day long - Lord Jesus I love you there is no one like you !!!
